snippet.title: Beyond a Steel Sky Official Trailer
snippet.description:
OUT NOW ON STEAM & APPLE ARCADE
From Charles Cecil, creator of the Broken Sword series, with art direction by Dave Gibbons, legendary comic book artist behind ‘Watchmen’, comes ‘Beyond A Steel Sky’, the long awaited sequel to the cult classic ‘Beneath a Steel Sky’. A groundbreaking 3D adventure thriller, set in an AI-driven future. Subvert the world, hack the systems and solve dark conspiracies to uncover the devastating truth.

“This second trip to Union City has been worth the 26-year hiatus”
81% – PC Gamer

“Beyond a Steel Sky reminds me a lot of the Telltale games, but better.”
90% – GameWatcher

“Beyond a Steel Sky is in many ways respectful of genre traditions but with modern wisdom and presentation. The game can be enjoyed without prior knowledge of Beneath a Steel Sky but obviously, it has a lot of gentle nods to its predecessor.”
90% – Darkstation

PLATFORMS: Apple Arcade (Mac & iOS) | Steam (Windows & Linux)

WHERE TO BUY:
   ◇ Apple Arcade: Free with a subscription: https://www.apple.com/apple-arcade
   ◇ Steam:  https://revsoft.games/BASS2viaSteam

FOR MORE:
